definitions.definition: The conditions and dimensions of battle , including terrain , weather , infrastructure , airspace , seaspace , cyberspace , near space , and outer space , considered in a unified military strategy to integrate and combine armed forces for the military theatre of operations .

main_definition: ( military ) The conditions and dimensions of battle , including terrain , weather , infrastructure , airspace , seaspace , cyberspace , near space , and outer space , considered in a unified military strategy to integrate and combine armed forces for the military theatre of operations .
